titles.title: Providing for consideration of the joint resolution (H.J. Res. 123) making further continuing appropriations for the fiscal year 2003, and for other purposes.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 107-755, by Mr. Hastings (WA).
H. Res. 550, H. Res. 551, and H. Res. 577 are laid on the table.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 230.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 585.
On ordering the previous question Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 209 - 193 (Roll no. 467).

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by recorded vote: 206 - 193 (Roll no. 468).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 10/15/2002--Reported to House without amendment. Provides for consideration of H.J. Res. 123 (further continuing appropriations for FY 2003).
